job_purpose: To design, build, and execute automation test frameworks for API and system testing, ensuring high-quality software releases throughout the project lifecycle.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design and build API driven test frameworks
Create and execute automation scripts for System Test, Integration test, Progression, Regression
Prepare and write Test Plans and Test Scripts
Perform Regression Testing, UI Testing, API Testing, and other forms of testing using automation
Develop Automation Feasibility Matrix based on requirements
Link business requirements with Test Cases and defects
Raise defects based on failures in Automation Test Reports
Provide consultation on best suited automation testing tools
Provide advice, guidance, and expertise in software design activities
Contribute to maintaining quality and reliability of software applications throughout project lifecycle
required_qualifications: Ability to identify and address potential issues or flaws in software through comprehensive testing methodologies
company_details: A leading organization in the software development industry, committed to delivering high-quality solutions through innovative testing practices and automation frameworks.
